title: Isfuglen
description: 'One day, one day soon, perhaps ...one of these brilliant creatures might be hers.' As an apprentice Bredinari, hot-tempered Kat is finally within touching distance of fulfilling her dream - to tame and ride her own hell horse, so that she can carry messages on behalf of the Castle, and help those in need. But then she reads a letter she shouldn't have read ...
author: Lene Kaaberb√∏l
